name: Beat Shot (Mix and Game Jam 2020)
description:
Beat Shot, shoot to the beat and make Double-Damage!

Beat Shot is a simple 2d, rythm, top down shooter game made for the Mix and Game Jam 2020.

In this Game you are a DJ shooting notes at Zombies to elimenate them, because they want to destroy you Dj Pult and eat you.

you will have 5 days to prepare yourself for the Fight, by getting weapons or healthpacks from a gas station,  hospital or an armory. But On the raid you can get hurt, be careful not to die in these raids.

Contols

  • Left-Mouse : Shoot
  • R  : Reload
  • H : Heal (only when you have Healthpacks and if you are fighting)
  • Escape : Quit Game

Made By: VimWaves and Matt

(our first Game Jam)
